entry.title: Less
entry.content: 初识less编译工具koala .less -> .css 输出方式normal:普通css compress:压缩过的css 注释123/*我会被编译的*/ //我不会被编译 变量12345678// @变量名：值;@test_width:300px;// 使用.body{ width: @test_width; height: @test_width;} 混合纯class混合123456789=====less=====.box{ .border;}.border{ border:solid 5px pink;} 12345=====css=====.box{ border:solid 5px pnik;} 带参数混合123456789=====less=====.border_02(@border_width){ border:solid yellow @border_width;}.test_hunhe{ .border_02(30px);} 12345=====css=====.test_hunhe { border: solid yellow 30px;} 不带参数混合(使用默认参数)1234567891011=====less=====.border_radius(@radius:5px){ -webkit-border-radius: @radius; -moz-border-radius: @radius; border-radius: @radius;}.radius_test{ .border_radius(10px);} 1234567=====css=====.radius_test{ -webkit-border-radius: 10px; -moz-border-radius: 10pxx; border-radius: 10px;} 匹配模式123456789101112131415161718192021=====less=====.pos(r){ position: relative;}.pos(a){ position: absolute;}.pos(f){ position: fixed;}.pipei{ .pos(r);}.pipei2{ .pos(a);}.pipei3{ .pos(f);} 1234567891011=====css=====.pipei{ position: relative;}.pipei2{ position: absolute;}.pipei3{ position: fixed;} 运算123456789=====less=====@test_01:300px;.box_02{ width: (@test_01 - 20) * 5; color: #ccc - 10; // 颜色转化成255,255,255计算} 123456=====css=====.box_02 { width: 1400px; color: #c2c2c2; } 嵌套1234567891011121314151617181920=====less=====.list{ width: 600px; height: 600px li{ height: 30px; height: 30px; a{ float: left; // &代表他的上一层选择器 &:hover{ color: red; } } }} 123456789101112131415=====css=====.list { width: 600px; height: 600px;}.list li { height: 30px;}.list li a { float: left;}.list li a:hover { color: red;} arguments包含了所有传进来的参数123456789=====less=====.border_arg(@w:30px,@c:red,@xx:solid){ border: @arguments;}.test_arg{ .border_arg(40px);} 12345=====css=====.test_arg { border: 40px red solid;} 避免编译12345=====less=====.test_03{ width: ~'calc(300px-30)';} 12345=====css=====.test_03 { width: calc(300px-30);} !important关键字1234567891011=====less=====.border_radius(@radius:5px){ -webkit-border-radius: @radius; -moz-border-radius: @radius; border-radius: @radius;}.test_impotant{ .border_radius()!important;} 1234567=====css=====.test_impotant { -webkit-border-radius: 5px !important; -moz-border-radius: 5px !important; border-radius: 5px !important;}
